statements: SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT contract_id, contract_name, metadata FROM smart_contracts WHERE metadata->>'language' = 'Solidity';
SELECT contract_name FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001', '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002');
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_name DESC;
SELECT contract_name, metadata FROM smart_contracts WHERE metadata ->> 'status' = 'active';
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_name LIKE 'Contract%';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts ORDER BY contract_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_name, contract_id FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT contract_id FROM transactions);
SELECT contract_name, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE metadata ->> 'owner' LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY contract_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_code, metadata FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 5;
SELECT contract_id, deployed_by FROM deployed_contracts WHERE execution_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM deployed_contracts WHERE deployment_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT contract_id, execution_status, deployment_time FROM deployed_contracts WHERE deployed_by = 'Alice';
SELECT contract_id, contract_code, metadata FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT deployed_by, deployment_time, execution_status FROM deployed_contracts WHERE deployment_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contract_id, metadata, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE metadata->'author' = 'Alice' AND contract_code ILIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM deployed_contracts WHERE execution_status = TRUE ORDER BY deployment_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT contract_id, COUNT(*) AS total_deployments FROM deployed_contracts GROUP BY contract_id HAVING total_deployments > 5;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT deployment_id, deployment_status FROM contract_deployments WHERE deployment_status = 'SUCCESS';
SELECT execution_id, execution_result FROM contract_executions ORDER BY execution_date DESC;
SELECT contract_id, contract_metadata FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_metadata->>'version' = '1.0';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_code, contract_metadata FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT deployment_id, deployment_status FROM contract_deployments ORDER BY deployment_date DESC;
SELECT contract_code, deployment_date, execution_status FROM smart_contracts JOIN contract_deployments ON smart_contracts.contract_id = contract_deployments.contract_id;
SELECT execution_id, execution_date, execution_result FROM contract_executions WHERE execution_status = 'success';
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_code, metadata FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, ownership_percentage FROM contract_owners WHERE ownership_percentage > 50;
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM contract_audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT version_id, version_code, created_date FROM contract_versions WHERE version_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT contract_id, contract_code, metadata FROM smart_contracts LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM contract_owners ORDER BY ownership_percentage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_id, action, timestamp FROM contract_audit_logs WHERE action = 'updated' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM contract_versions WHERE created_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY version_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_id, version_code, created_date FROM contract_versions WHERE contract_id = 3 ORDER BY created_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT contract_id, execution_date, execution_status FROM execution_logs ORDER BY execution_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_details->>'event_type' AS event_type FROM contract_events WHERE contract_id = 2;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM contract_owners WHERE owner_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM smart_contracts;
SELECT contract_id, contract_code FROM smart_contracts WHERE contract_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM contract_owners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT contract_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM execution_logs GROUP BY contract_id;
SELECT contract_id, AVG(storage_value) AS avg_storage_value FROM contract_storage GROUP BY contract_id;
